{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-MR3420 |revision=v1 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |type=wireless router |fcc_date=05/05/2010 |fcc_id=TE7MR3420 |pcb_id=20503420-1.0 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7241 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206E |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622FTP-D43 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G capable |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=90:F6:52,F4:EC:38 |oui_eth=90:F6:52,F4:EC:38 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N 3G Router}} :[https://www.tp-link.com/en/home-networking/3g-4g-router/tl-mr3420/ Product page]{{â€¢}}[http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-MR3420&version=V1#tbl_j Firmware] "20503420-1.0" and "Rev:1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board. :"2050500114" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on a v1.2 model. *[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=147981 ''TP-LINK TL-MR3420'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-mr3420#info ''TP-LINK TL-MR3420'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] 
Hardware Info
Model:		MR3420			MR3420
Version:	1/1.1/1.2		2.3
Manufacturer:	Atheros 		Atheros
Bootloader:	U-Boot			U-Boot
Architecture:	MIPS 24Kc		MIPS 74Kc
System-On-Chip:	Atheros AR7241@400MHz	Atheros AR9341@535MHz
Flash chip:	Macronix MX25L3206E/	Winbond W25Q32BV/
		cFeon F32-100HIP	Spansion FL032PIF
Flash size:	4 MiB 			4 MiB
RAM chip:	Zentel A3S56D40FTP-G5	Winbond W9425G6JH-5
RAM size:	32 MiB	 		32 MiB
Wireless:	Atheros AR9287 (2T2R)	Atheros AR9341 (2T2R)
Antenae(s):	2 Removables x 3dBi	2 Removables x 3dBi
Ethernet:	4x LAN, 1x WAN 10/100	4x LAN, 1x WAN 10/100
USB:		1 x 2.0 		1 x 2.0
